package.name: memcache
package.description: Memcached is a caching daemon designed especially for dynamic web applications to decrease database load by storing objects in memory. This extension allows you to work with memcached through handy OO interface.

release.notes: 1) Added new methods: getStats(), increment(), decrement(). 2) Keys are processed to keep syntax consistency. Extension should be stable enough since this version.
New methods: getStats(), increment(), decrement(). Extension should be rather stable.
